revision.text:
Wintex is a very outdated tool for wad editing. However, it has some support for zdoom and with a little patience can be used efficiently. It has many bugs, and it is recommended you use a more up to date tool, like XWE or SLumpEd.
It can be found here: http://www.gamers.org/pub/idgames/utils/graphics_edit/deutex/wintex50.zip [[Category:Tools]]
